measured_by: weights assigned to the five sampled rewards in the Free-Weight Cognitive Model
justification: "The average of the five weights from fitting the Free-Weight Cognitive Model indicated that individuals weighed more recent rewards more heavily than earlier ones. This finding points to an overall recency bias."
